ğŸ  Common Seafood Vocabulary

English Name Description
Fish General term for aquatic animals with fins
Salmon Pink-fleshed fish, often grilled or raw (sushi)
Tuna Popular in sushi and canned form
Cod Mild white fish, often used in fish & chips
Mackerel Oily fish with strong flavor
Sardines Small oily fish, often canned
Shrimp / Prawns Small crustaceans, very common in cooking
Lobster Large crustacean, considered a delicacy
Crab Crustacean with claws, sweet meat
Scallops Round shellfish, tender texture
Clams Small shellfish with a hard shell
Mussels Black-shelled mollusks, steamed often
Squid Has tentacles, used in calamari
Octopus Similar to squid, chewy texture
Seaweed Edible marine algae, common in Asian cuisine
